strIntroduction: What You'll Do Travel on the scenic route of the N2 towards Gansbaai. Upon arrival guests will receive breakfast and a briefing by trained site guides of what to expect. Charter a boat to encounter the Great White Sharks from the safety of a cage. All diving gear included. Estimated time on the water is 3- 4 hours. Fresh towels and warm showers upon your return to the base. Lunch and soft drinks served while guests watch the DVD of the day. See the town of Hermanus on the return to Cape Town with an option of either wine tasting at 2 wineries or land-based hale watching (only in season). A quick stop at Stony Point in Betty's Bay to see the African Penguins Colony. Travel on the scenic route of the N2 towards Gansbaai.
